::Symphony::

     Symphony had woke up, and he had been wondering about fo=
r a while now.  He was who knows how far from the CF now.  He had even reac=
hed ocean.  He kept going.

      "Man......I think I'm....lo-No, I'm not! =
 I'm just touring!" He said, trying to keep his mood good.

       Then, Sy=
mphony saw a cave.  He saw the cave being blocked by several bots.  Symphon=
y hid behind a tree.  He listened.  There was...A Maximal!!  Being held pri=
soner!!!!  Symphony felt heroic.  He had a sudden urge to jump in there and=
 save that Maximal, even if it risked his own life!  He was sick and tired =
of seeing people die, hearing of deaths, being in an environment of war, an=
d doing nothing.  For centuries, he had to watch his brothers go out to war=
, and see them come back wounded.  He wouldn't let anymore happen to his fr=
iends, family and teammates!!!!  He was about to open his com to all Maxima=
ls to ask for help, but then hesitated.  No, he was also tired of being use=
less.  This was his turn to do the dirtywork!

         "RRAAAAHHHHHHH!!!!!=
!!!" Symphony gave his loudest warcry.  

         Symphony fired his machi=
ne gun madly at the Terrorcons, and at the same time was running into the c=
ave.  He was going to save that Maximal!  He had to!  He took advantage of =
his size.  Symphony rolled under the legs of anybody blocking the cave, and=
 slipped in.  He turned so his back was facing Condor.  He kept firing at a=
ll the Terrorcons, trying as hard as he could to protect Condor.
